name: part_014
file: tmp_hololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2022▷2023 -hololive side-【#ホロライブカウントダウン】 [n-fzN8-i3Qc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs the song 'Senbonzakura' on a festive New Year-themed stage.
MC section where Tokino Sora greets the audience for the New Year and introduces her furisode outfit and the stage decorations.

subtitles.original: 千本桜
subtitles.english: Senbonzakura

subtitles.original: 逆戦錬磨の見た目は将校
subtitles.english: Hardened by countless battles, appearing like an officer

subtitles.original: 行ったり来たりの花魁道中
subtitles.english: Coming and going in an Oiran procession

subtitles.original: アイツもコイツも皆で集まれ
subtitles.english: Gather everyone, this guy and that guy

subtitles.original: 聖者の行進 ワン・ツー・サン・シ
subtitles.english: The march of the saints, one, two, three, four

subtitles.original: 禅定門を潜り抜けて
subtitles.english: Passing through the Zen gate

subtitles.original: 安楽浄土 厄払い
subtitles.english: The Pure Land of Bliss, warding off evil

subtitles.original: きっと最後は
subtitles.english: Surely at the end

subtitles.original: 大団円
subtitles.english: The grand finale

subtitles.original: 拍手の合間に
subtitles.english: In the midst of the applause

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜に紛れ
subtitles.english: A thousand cherry trees, blending into the night

subtitles.original: 君の声も届かないよ
subtitles.english: Even your voice won't reach me

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻
subtitles.english: Here is a feast, a cage of steel

subtitles.original: その断頭台で見下ろして
subtitles.english: Look down from that guillotine

subtitles.original: 三千世界 常世の闇
subtitles.english: The entire universe, the darkness of the underworld

subtitles.original: 嘆く唄も聞こえないよ
subtitles.english: Even the song of lament cannot be heard

subtitles.original: 青藍の空 遥か彼方
subtitles.english: The indigo sky, far, far away

subtitles.original: その光線銃を打ち上げろ
subtitles.english: Fire that ray gun

subtitles.original: 環状線を走り抜けて
subtitles.english: Running through the loop line

subtitles.original: 東奔西走なんのその
subtitles.english: Tossing and turning, it's nothing

subtitles.original: 少年少女 戦国無双
subtitles.english: Boys and girls, unparalleled in the warring states

subtitles.original: 浮世の随に
subtitles.english: Following the fleeting world

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜に紛れ
subtitles.english: A thousand cherry trees, blending into the night

subtitles.original: 君の声も届かないよ
subtitles.english: Even your voice won't reach me

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻
subtitles.english: Here is a feast, a cage of steel

subtitles.original: その断頭台を飛び降りて
subtitles.english: Jump down from that guillotine

subtitles.original: 千本桜 夜に紛れ
subtitles.english: A thousand cherry trees, blending into the night

subtitles.original: 君が歌い 僕は踊る
subtitles.english: You sing, and I will dance

subtitles.original: 此処は宴 鋼の檻
subtitles.english: Here is a feast, a cage of steel

subtitles.original: さあ光線銃を撃ちまくれ
subtitles.english: Now, fire that ray gun like crazy

subtitles.original: 改めて、あけましておめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year, once again!

subtitles.original: お正月ということで...
subtitles.english: Since it's New Year's...

subtitles.original: ...振袖で登場しちゃいました。
subtitles.english: ...I've appeared in my furisode.

subtitles.original: いかがですか？振袖。
subtitles.english: How do you like the furisode?

subtitles.original: 去年の新年の新聞でね...
subtitles.english: This is the kimono I was wearing...

subtitles.original: ...着ていた着物になります。
subtitles.english: ...in last year's New Year's newspaper.

subtitles.original: なんかこうやって実際に着物着てみると...
subtitles.english: Wearing a kimono in person like this...

subtitles.original: ...ちょっと、なんか身が引き締まる思いですね。
subtitles.english: ...really makes me feel a bit more composed.

subtitles.original: そして、ステージも見てください！
subtitles.english: And please, look at the stage!

subtitles.original: こんなに豪華なステージがあるんですよ。
subtitles.english: There's such a magnificent stage here.

subtitles.original: あっち、見に行きましょう、あっち。
subtitles.english: Let's go over there and take a look.

subtitles.original: こちらには、今年がね...
subtitles.english: Over here, since this year...

subtitles.original: ...うさぎ年ということで...
subtitles.english: ...is the Year of the Rabbit...

subtitles.original: ...うさぎの、なんか飛んでるうさぎさんがいたりとか。
subtitles.english: ...there are things like these flying bunnies.

subtitles.original: 後ろの金屏風には富士山が描いてあったりとか。
subtitles.english: And Mount Fuji is painted on the golden folding screen behind me.

subtitles.original: あとは、綺麗なお花。
subtitles.english: Plus, there are beautiful flowers.

subtitles.original: あと、門松。
subtitles.english: And Kadomatsu.

subtitles.original: 門松はね、あっち側にもあるんですよ。見てください。
subtitles.english: There's another Kadomatsu over on that side, too. Take a look.

subtitles.original: 立派な木もありますね。
subtitles.english: There's also a grand tree.

subtitles.original: こんな感じでなんかもう「お正月おめでたいね」っていう感じの...
subtitles.english: It's a stage that really gives off...

subtitles.original: ...ステージになってます。
subtitles.english: ...that festive 'Happy New Year' feeling.

subtitles.original: 上にはね、迎春って書いてあるんだよ。ほら！
subtitles.english: On top, it says 'Geishun' (Welcome Spring). Look!

subtitles.original: みんなも... あ！だるま！
subtitles.english: Everyone... Oh! A Daruma!

subtitles.original: だるまのうさぎさんもいる！可愛い！
subtitles.english: There's a Daruma rabbit too! So cute!

subtitles.original: 素敵なね、お正月のステージ。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for this wonderful New Year's stage.

subtitles.original: いやー...。そして、この装い... 洋服ではないんですけど...
subtitles.english: Well... And this outfit... it's not Western clothes, but...

subtitles.original: ...この格好。覚えてますか？
subtitles.english: ...do you remember this look?

subtitles.original: こういう感じで新聞に載っておりました。
subtitles.english: This is how I appeared in the newspaper.

subtitles.original: あん肝も、あん肝も今とっても喜んでるよ。
subtitles.english: Ankimo is also very happy right now.

subtitles.original: 「ボクもお正月に出れたよー」って喜んでる。
subtitles.english: He's happy, saying, 'I got to appear for New Year's too!'

subtitles.original: そして、この... 後ろとかもちょっと見てみましょう。
subtitles.english: And let's take a look at the back too.

subtitles.original: 帯がね、こういう感じですごく...
subtitles.english: The obi is like this, and it's quite...

subtitles.original: ...ちょっとね、大人っぽいものになっていたりとか。
subtitles.english: ...it's a bit of a more mature design.

subtitles.original: ま、柄はね、やっぱお花になっていて、下のほうからだんだん...
subtitles.english: Well, the pattern is flowers, of course, starting from the bottom and gradually...
